alert.note: Alert for Adams; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 12:55AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF LEWIS, SOUTHEASTERN ADAMS AND SOUTHWESTERN SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 115 AM EDT... At 1255 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Tollesboro, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Vanceburg, Camp Dix, Tollesboro, Rome, Sandy Springs, Buena Vista in Scioto County, Saint Paul, Carrs, Kinniconick, Tannery, Epworth, Ribolt, Charters, Garrison, Petersville, Stricklett, Glen Springs, Rexton and Herron Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM EDT for northern and northeastern Kentucky...and southwestern Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
